summary.p: An incomplete copy of the Kuṟaḷ (Aṟappāl and Poruṭpāl) with Beschi’s Latin translation and commentary.

Double Tamil title page (title page 1, title page 2), followed by a 4-page French notice, Latin preamble, Latin title page, French colophon with a date (1847) (f7r), beginning of text on f8r (Tamil text, Latin translation and explanation).
Description by Eva Wilden based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Original manuscript examined by Emmanuel Francis (October 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

origin.origDate: Internally dated. See colophon (U3, f7r): copy made between 1847-10-17 and 1847-11-27. On a master copy owned by the Jesuit mission in Pondicherry (see U3, f3r).

provenance.p: Autograph (?) manuscript by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

ab.term:
Notice
du manuscrit original
et
de la présente copie.

Le manuscrit d'après lequel j'ai copié celui ci est la propriété de la maison des missions étrangères à Pondichéri: A en juger par l'écriture qui est lourde et carrée, d'ailleurs bonne, régulière et fort lisible, il sort de la main d'un prêtre. Cette écriture & et son apparence matérielle le font remonter à un siècle environ.
